name: brackets-smooth-scroll
title: Smooth Scroll
description: Forked from https://github.com/hccampos/brackets-smooth-scroll (Fixed the var MAX_FORCE to 0.02, because it was a very big step while scrolling.) Adds kinetic smooth scrolling (like MacOS, iOS and Android) to Brackets for devices and/or operating systems that don't support it natively.
author: Hugo Campos <hcfields@gmail.com> (http://www.hccampos.net)
